entry.title: Akka, Scala & Microservices
entry.summary:
Last year I accumulated some bucks with Bonusly and I converted it into 5 sweet books.

Now they just arrived!!!

I already started my studies in Scala and Functional Programming. I finished the Functional Programming Principles in Scala course on Coursera.

At first it was very hard think in terms of recursion, immutability, high-order functions, pattern matching, etc. But after your get used to it, you will see that writing code in functional style is much more fun than object-oriented.

Besides that, I've been working with Akka Actors since 2013, but with Java. Now I want to learn Akka Streams in Scala, but focused on building microservices. So, let's study.
